title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

**2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor**

**Modern and Artistic Circle on Circles Design**

Add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your home decor with this stunning 2-set gold circle mirrors wall decor. Featuring a unique circle on circles design, these mirrors are sure to become a conversation starter in any room.

**Product Details:**

* Set includes 2 mirrors
* Design: Circle on circles
* Decor type: Modern and artistic wall art
* Size: 15.7 inches in diameter with frame, 10 inches in diameter without frame
* Frame material: Iron
* Frame color: Gold with a finish between matte and bright
* Hanging method: Easy to hang with a single screw
* Weight: 2 pounds
* Glass quality: High-quality annealed glass with HD imaging, preventing warping and distortion

**Versatility and Styling Options:**

* Matches with various decoration styles, including modern, artistic, and novelty home decor
* Suitable for multiple locations, such as living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, entryways, and office spaces
* Can be styled independently or combined with other wall art, including picture walls, above TV, with paintings, wall sculptures, and candle sconces

**Package and Delivery:**

* Decent package ensures safe delivery

**Order now and add a touch of modern elegance to your home decor!**
